Posts.Content:
I was diagnosed with breast cancer this past November. I had a lumpectomy and will be receiving radiation treatment. Depending on my Oncotype DX score, I may also need chemo. My oncologist also is planning to put me on a hormonal therapy medication. I am 67 years old. I am very concerned about
 how I will handle all of the cancer treatment along with dealing with arthritis. Has anyone else dealt with both of these conditions? I need advice.
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed with Breast Cancer and RA

Posts.Content: Thank you. I did go to breastcancer.org--what a wonderful site, but I'm also familiar with HealingWell and hope someone here may have an answer.
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed with Breast Cancer and RA
